metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18018 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: In GNU Coreutils through 8.29, chown-core.c in chown and chgrp does notprevent replacement of a plain file with a symlink during use of the POSIX"-R -L" options, which allows local users to modify the ownership ofarbitrary files by leveraging a race condition.

criterions.comment: coreutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
